name: Artem, Wen Dark Mode
imagePrompt: A confident, slightly exasperated designer meticulously drawing blueprints for a glowing 'Orb' logo, surrounded by tiny, confused-looking digital avatars asking 'wen dark mode?'
abilityText: Battlecry: Give all friendly minions +2/+2. Taunt. 'Dark mode is coming. Soon. Very soon. Stop asking.'
flavorText: Has answered 'wen dark mode?' exactly 47,291 times. Each answer was 'soon.' It's been two years.
